headline: GTA Online
subtitle: Associate and Bodyguard Salary Boosts and Bonuses
content:
Salaries for Associates and Bodyguards recruited via SecuroServ are tripled through April 13.

Associates, Bodyguards or MC Members who tag along to successfully complete a Gunrunning Sell Mission, Nightclub Management Mission, Biker Sell Mission, will get a GTA$250,000 bonus, delivered within 72 hours of completion.

To hire Associates & Bodyguards, you must first acquire a CEO office and from your office PC open the interactions menu, find the SecuroServ option and select 'register as a VIP'
